item.title: CVE-2020-5205|2024-08-04T08:22:08.880Z -- danschultzer -- pow
item.description: In Pow (Hex package) before 1.0.16, the use of Plug.Session in Pow.Plug.Session is susceptible to session fixation attacks if a persistent session store is used for Plug.Session, such as Redis or a database. Cookie store, which is used in most Phoenix apps, doesn't have this vulnerability.
